channel.title: Defusion Specz
channel.description:
Credits Core,Jagex makers of Runescape and me.
* Cleaned up NpcSpawn.cfg * Made teleports require no runes or magic level; changed the Varrock teleport to teleport you to Edgeville. * Added the Warrior NpcDailogue + open the Skillcape Shop when you click "Yes Please." + Added Skillcapes. * Fixed all the "Examine" comments when you examine a skillcape. * Added a Barrows NPC, Leo. Added Dialogue to him + give you a spade if you decide to go to Barrows. * Changed the Teleport's Coords, Names, and [their descriptions.] - Marty-. * Fixed the Teleport GFX speed, works correctly. - Playernt * Fixed the 190 Arrows Bug.- Playernt * Clicking on the Watchtower Teleport converts to ancient and clicking the Ghorock Teleport converts to modern.. * Added my own training area with my own npc's. * Added my own shops and set to RuneScape's prices (GE). (Realistic and reasonable; based off of RuneScape). * Changed a few of the NPC's Dialogues to better suit the server. * Started finishing Thieving. * Blood Rune withrawing fixed. * Fixed a few of the 2-Handed weapon animations on a few of the 2-Handed weapons. * Fixed the 2-Handed equip bug. - grimreaper61 * Added the Dragon Platebody models & ints. * Added the Dragon Full Helm models & ints. [Doesn't equip in the right spot]. * Custom Quest Tab. - .Zach (Client-side) * Fixed player 'scam' bug. - Prima. * Fixed the Controlled Attack option, actually adds exp. to train * Added basics of Auto-Retaliation. * Found and fixed a fault, which caused the server to take up a lot more Memory Usage than the server should do. * Fixed bug: Magic tabs. * Fixed bug: You couldn't see players after you died. * Fixed bug: Granite maul special attack. * Fixed bug: Wilderness skull not disappearing after leaving wilderness. * Fixed bug: NPC drops. * Fixed bug: Wilderness levels in duel arena. * Fixed bug: Client crashing. * Removed: Lunar interface. * Increased Stability; Uses 3x less CPU now. * Handled all packets. * Handled NPC combat. * Handled Leather Crafting. * Handled Minigames. * Fixed logging in glitch. * Removed a lot of unnecessary codes. * Based in Edgeville. * PvN magic. * Finished: Barrows. * Shops in edgeville include: Crafting shop, general store (All shops will be added in V1.1). * Crafting added. Includes Full leather crafting (Gem cutting & amulet creation will be added in V1.1). * Full skulling added: You attack someone, you skull; they attack you back, they don't skull. You also lose all items if you are skulled and you don't have protect item on, if you die. * More use of events, and less 'processing' used. * Tzhaar NPC teleports you to fight cave entrance. * Warrior in edgeville (Is going to be used for teleportation to the warriors guild, and the skillcape shop). * Vannaka (Slayer master) in edgeville will give you tasks, and has the slayer shop. * Server is packaged and very easy to edit. * All classes are easy to access and find. * All files such as data files and config files are neatly tidied into separate folders in the 'bin' folder. * Perfect PvP and NvP combat. * Perfect following and combat following, working with range, melee, magic AND autocasting. * Fully working autocasting on players. * Perfect 1v1 areas with PvP combat. * Perfect attack and defence bonuses for melee, range and magic. * FULL PvP magic. * No NvP magic added yet. * Almost finished Barrows. * 56 waves of the Tzhaar Fight cave. * Fully working headicons - loaded through the cache; not hardcoded. * Fully working Hint icon, which is used in dueling and NPC's who attack you such as the barrows brothers. * Almost finished dueling. Still some rules to finish off. Full staking, and most rules work. * Fully working wilderness levels; no shit PvP levels. * Projectiles follow you, or your projectiles follow the enemy - This works with both NPCs and Players. * Most special attacks added. * Perfect second hit mask - No timers for double hitting special attacks. * Perfect timers for magic. E.G. blitz has the delay between the GFX and the actual hit. * Some skills started on. These include cooking, thieving, fishing and herblore.
To do list
* Add all new npc models and inventory models * Add Godsword Stances * Fix Pestcontrol * Add fightpits * Finish off Barb assault map * Fix whip * Add Orbs * Class Select (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8td1FkhI5us) * New price check interface * Welcome Screen * JFrame * Spec's for godswords,barrelchest anchor,Dragon claws, Statius,Vesta (reall rs specs) * Add World map so it gives you a map and you click where you want to go but ( you need to get 99 stats and 30 qp) * Point exchange -Hovering working -Buttons all working -Selecting working - light up when selected -Six options to select -Can change the items/text -couple more features [img]http://i723.photobucket.com/albums/ww235/Ascheriit/PointExchange.jpg[/img]
Will release more pics about magic combat ex..
*[quote="Newty"][quote author=YOUBEEDRED link=action=profile;u=357806 date=1250675079] May i have permission for development team? [/quote]
Make sure it follows all the rules and you have at least one picture as proof of development. Also, there can be no advertisement.[/quote]
[img]http://i30.tinypic.com/a2vujk.jpg[/img]
[size=15pt]If you want to join pm me[/size]

@Tom wrote:

Good work Ervis

and Goodluck

Read full topic

item.title: Defusion Specz
item.dc:creator: @YOUBEEDRED YOUBEEDRED
item.description:
@YOUBEEDRED wrote:

Credits Core,Jagex makers of Runescape and me.

  • Cleaned up NpcSpawn.cfg
    • Made teleports require no runes or magic level; changed the Varrock teleport to teleport you to Edgeville.
    • Added the Warrior NpcDailogue + open the Skillcape Shop when you click “Yes Please.” + Added Skillcapes.
    • Fixed all the “Examine” comments when you examine a skillcape.
    • Added a Barrows NPC, Leo. Added Dialogue to him + give you a spade if you decide to go to Barrows.
    • Changed the Teleport’s Coords, Names, and [their descriptions.] - Marty-.
    • Fixed the Teleport GFX speed, works correctly. - Playernt
    • Fixed the 190 Arrows Bug.- Playernt
    • Clicking on the Watchtower Teleport converts to ancient and clicking the Ghorock Teleport converts to modern…
    • Added my own training area with my own npc’s.
    • Added my own shops and set to RuneScape’s prices (GE). (Realistic and reasonable; based off of RuneScape).
    • Changed a few of the NPC’s Dialogues to better suit the server.
    • Started finishing Thieving.
    • Blood Rune withrawing fixed.
    • Fixed a few of the 2-Handed weapon animations on a few of the 2-Handed weapons.
    • Fixed the 2-Handed equip bug. - grimreaper61
    • Added the Dragon Platebody models & ints.
    • Added the Dragon Full Helm models & ints. [Doesn’t equip in the right spot].
    • Custom Quest Tab. - .Zach (Client-side)
    • Fixed player ‘scam’ bug. - Prima.
    • Fixed the Controlled Attack option, actually adds exp. to train
    • Added basics of Auto-Retaliation.
    • Found and fixed a fault, which caused the server to take up a lot more Memory Usage than the server should
      do.
    • Fixed bug: Magic tabs.
    • Fixed bug: You couldn’t see players after you died.
    • Fixed bug: Granite maul special attack.
    • Fixed bug: Wilderness skull not disappearing after leaving wilderness.
    • Fixed bug: NPC drops.
    • Fixed bug: Wilderness levels in duel arena.
    • Fixed bug: Client crashing.
    • Removed: Lunar interface.
    • Increased Stability; Uses 3x less CPU now.
    • Handled all packets.
    • Handled NPC combat.
    • Handled Leather Crafting.
    • Handled Minigames.
    • Fixed logging in glitch.
    • Removed a lot of unnecessary codes.
    • Based in Edgeville.
    • PvN magic.
    • Finished: Barrows.
    • Shops in edgeville include: Crafting shop, general store (All shops will be added in V1.1).
    • Crafting added. Includes Full leather crafting (Gem cutting & amulet creation will be added in V1.1).
    • Full skulling added: You attack someone, you skull; they attack you back, they don’t skull. You also lose
      all items if you are skulled and you don’t have protect item on, if you die.
    • More use of events, and less ‘processing’ used.
    • Tzhaar NPC teleports you to fight cave entrance.
    • Warrior in edgeville (Is going to be used for teleportation to the warriors guild, and the skillcape shop).
    • Vannaka (Slayer master) in edgeville will give you tasks, and has the slayer shop.
    • Server is packaged and very easy to edit.
    • All classes are easy to access and find.
    • All files such as data files and config files are neatly tidied into separate folders in the ‘bin’ folder.
    • Perfect PvP and NvP combat.
    • Perfect following and combat following, working with range, melee, magic AND autocasting.
    • Fully working autocasting on players.
    • Perfect 1v1 areas with PvP combat.
    • Perfect attack and defence bonuses for melee, range and magic.
    • FULL PvP magic.
    • No NvP magic added yet.
    • Almost finished Barrows.
    • 56 waves of the Tzhaar Fight cave.
    • Fully working headicons - loaded through the cache; not hardcoded.
    • Fully working Hint icon, which is used in dueling and NPC’s who attack you such as the barrows brothers.
    • Almost finished dueling. Still some rules to finish off. Full staking, and most rules work.
    • Fully working wilderness levels; no shit PvP levels.
    • Projectiles follow you, or your projectiles follow the enemy - This works with both NPCs and Players.
    • Most special attacks added.
    • Perfect second hit mask - No timers for double hitting special attacks.
    • Perfect timers for magic. E.G. blitz has the delay between the GFX and the actual hit.
    • Some skills started on. These include cooking, thieving, fishing and herblore.

To do list

* Add all new npc models and inventory models
* Add Godsword Stances
* Fix Pestcontrol
* Add fightpits
* Finish off Barb assault map
* Fix whip
* Add Orbs
* Class Select (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8td1FkhI5us)
* New price check interface
* Welcome Screen
* JFrame
* Spec's for godswords,barrelchest anchor,Dragon claws, Statius,Vesta (reall rs specs)
* Add World map so it gives you a map and you click where you want to go but ( you need to get 99 stats and 30 qp)
* Point exchange
                -Hovering working
                -Buttons all working
                -Selecting working - light up when selected
                -Six options to select
                -Can change the items/text
                -couple more features

PointExchange.jpg766×505

Will release more pics about magic combat ex…

*[quote=“Newty”][quote author=YOUBEEDRED link=action=profile;u=357806 date=1250675079]
May i have permission for development team?
[/quote]

Make sure it follows all the rules and you have at least one picture as proof of development. Also, there can be no advertisement.[/quote]

a2vujk.jpg755×1499

[size=15pt]If you want to join pm me[/size]

Read full topic
